#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
#define LL long long
LL max(LL a,LL b){return (a>b)?a:b;}
int main()
{
 LL N,x,k,m,i,j,t,ans,a,b,c,z=0;
 LL K[30]={},M;//T[1000000]={};
 pair<LL,LL>A[30];
 scanf("%lld",&N);
 while(N--)
 {
  x=ans=0;z++;
  scanf("%lld %lld",&k,&m);
  for(i=1;i<=k;i++)K[i]=0;
  for(i=1;i<=k;i++)
  {
   scanf("%lld %lld",&A[i].first,&A[i].second);
   x=max(x,A[i].second);
  }
  for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
  {
   scanf("%lld",&a);
   for(j=1;j<=a;j++)
   {
    scanf("%lld %lld",&b,&c);
	K[b]+=c;
   }
  }
  for(t=1;t<=x;t++,M=0)
   for(i=1;i<=k;i++)
    if(t>=A[i].first&&t<=A[i].second)
	{
	  M+=K[i];//T[t]+=K[i];
      ans=max(M,ans);//ans=max(ans,T[t]);
	}
  printf("Case %lld: %lld\n",z,ans);
 }
 return 0;
}
